bio:
Donnel is an elderly man who lives in Markarth. He has long white hair.
Donnel and Nana Ildene work as servants at the Treasury House in Markarth, for the Silver-Blood family. They have both worked there for the last few decades, and spend most of their working hours cleaning the building. His coworker and compatriot Nana is a woman who is slightly younger than Donnel. Donnel and Nana are secretly affiliated with the Forsworn rebel group. Donnel will not admit to being a member of the Forsworn. Donnel will become offended with anyone who asks investigates Weylin's recent attack against Margret in the Markarth marketplace.
During combat, Donnel will use his steel dagger, as well as the spells Flames, Oakflesh, and Raise Zombie.
Quotes:
"I work for the Silver-Bloods. I help clean."
"Just here to work."
name: Donnel
